data.message: hey Facebook , is there anyway you guys can verify my Facebook page with a blue badge  because a lot of people think its not me also my page is gaining fast too

replies.message: Hey Isaya. If you're an admin of a local business Page, you may be eligible for a gray verification badge, which you'll see in your Page's settings. Learn more: http://bit.ly/1UYMc7e. If your Page represents a celebrity, public figure, sports team, media or entertainment, you may be eligible for a blue verification badge. To see if your Page is eligible, please fill out this form: http://bit.ly/1S7JU23. -Jordan

Facebook I've uploaded my document that has my information on it and phone number and it's like 2 weeks already and the badge hasn't showed up yet. By the way I'm a rapper. I'm just trying to get my page verified :)
